attributes.action: Name 1 person who has died worldwide in the last 1,000 years due to the use of cannabis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why is tobacco and alcohol not classified as being more dangerous than cannabis as there have never been any reported deaths due to cannabis use in the entirety of planet earths existence.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
